description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter Pancakes & Salted Caramel Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Microwave,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Father's Day
name: Peanut Butter Pancakes & Salted Caramel Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the peanut butter into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on medium for 20-30 seconds or until soft.
Whisk in eggs and buttermilk until combined. Add to dry ingredients for basic pancake mixture.
Heat a large frying pan or flat grill plate over medium-low heat. Grease with a little butter.

Add 1/3 cup batter to the pan for each pancake. Cook in batches, being careful not to crowd the pan, for 2-3 minutes or until edges are set and bubbles appear on surface. Flip over and cook for 1 minute. Keep warm.
Warm dessert sauce according to jar instructions or until just pourable.
Stack pancakes on plates. Serve topped with cream, sauce and peanuts.
